summary: A 1980s-set drama about a teenage girl undergoing her sexual awakening when she learns about her father's infidelities.
cast: Laura Neiva|Vincent Cassel|Camilla Belle|Izadora Armelin|Max Huszar|Débora Bloch|Matthew Rougé|Thiare Maia|Cauã Reymond|Maysa Miranda|Thomas Huszar|Josefina Schiller|Gabriela Flarys|Valentine Fontanella|Bernardo Bichucher|Daniel Passi|Nathalia Zemel|Rafaela Prestes|Gregório Duvivier
title: Al vaivén
